IntroSection.name: Mrkk1
IntroSection.short_intro: I enjoy the happiness of turning ideas into reality with code.

AboutSection.desc: I am a core contributor to the open-source project uniai and a Node.js full-stack developer. I have interned at the University Network Information Center, Pujiang County Bureau of Culture, Radio, Television, and Tourism, and the Suzhou Institute of Intelligent Computing Technology, CAS. I currently work at iFLYTEK Future, focusing on AI-related development. I have extensive experience in developing projects from 0 to 1.
